page.name: Public Cloud
page.page_description: Welcome to the Public Cloud status page for real-time information on system performance and availability.
page.headline: Public Cloud OVHcloud Status : incidents, maintenances
page.notifications_email_footer: You received this email because you are subscribed to Public Cloud's service status notifications.

components.name: Identity, Security & Operations || Key Management Service

incidents.name: [RBX][Storage] - Object Storage S3 Standard/High Perf/Cold Archive
incidents.message: We would like to inform you that an incident on Object Storage S3 Standard/High Perf/Cold Archive happened and has now been resolved. Here is detail for this incident : Start time : 31/05/2025 22:35 UTC End time : 01/06/2025 00:30 UTC Service impact: Some servers were unreachable. Customers impact : Customers may have experienced 503 errors when they wanted to use their services. Root Cause : This incident was caused by malfunction on some hardwares. We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident.
